title: 2+1 in Burbank + Newly Remodeled + Patio/Balcony, Vinyl Plank Flooring
posting_body: LIVE VIDEO CALLS & IN-PERSON TOURS AVAILABLE
303 Apartments offers beautifully upgraded 1 bedrooms and 2 bedrooms equipped with appointments such as stainless steel kitchen appliances, hardwood style floors, and granite countertops.
Select apartments even include a balcony or patio which gives you a nice place to relax and enjoy some fresh air.
Amenities include assigned parking and access to on site laundry facilities.
You are also sure to love our new renovated courtyard.
Have both convenience and luxury when you live at 303 apartments.
Pets Welcome with an Additional Deposit.
Price and availability are subject to change.

Close to 5 and 134 Freeways, Porto's Bakery/Cafe, Mambo's Cafe, Porto's, Bakery/Cafe,BJ's Restaurant, Golden Road Brewing LA, The Stage, Pickwick Bowl, AMC Theatre, The Blue Room, Burbank Town Center, Walmart Supercenter, Costco, Trader Joe's, Ralphs, Burbank High School, Joaquin Miller Elementary School, Balboa Elementary School, Thomas Jefferson Elementary, Grand View, Grand Central, El Miradero, Glenwood.
